Summary: saw silver cigar shaped craft in daylight that dis
divs: Sighting DetailsI was a passenger in a car driven by my boyfriend and we were heading to thegrocery store. I saw an object high in the sky that was cigar shaped and I keptmy eye on it thinking it was an odd plane. I just kept looking at it for abouta minute or a little over and then suddenly it disappeared. I was shocked tosee it vanish on such a clear day so I said something to my boyfriend about it. He did not witness it at all. I have remained puzzled by what I saw so decidedto report it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in EnglewoodVenice
This sighting has never been favorited.
